name: The Mystery of Silver Mountain
overview: The game is set in an imaginary land ruled by a wicked tyrant. Your task is to free the people of the land from his domination. You will need to use magic as well as your skill and imagination to succeed. The game is intended to be played in conjunction with the book. The first half of the book contains the supporting story & illustrations (the game has no graphics) and also contains clues and visual cues for the adventure. The second half contains the game listing which is required to be typed in. The game supports saving and loading.
